name: damp-mulch
effect: Used on a patch of soil : Plantâ€™s growth stages will each last 25% more time. Dries soil out more slowly.
short_effect: Growing time of berries is increased, but the soil dries out slower.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A plant fertilizer spread on soft soil. It slows the growth of Berries and causes the soil to dry slower.
flavor_text.platinum: A plant fertilizer spread on soft soil. It slows the growth of Berries and causes the soil to dry slower.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil. It slows the growth of Berries and causes the soil to dry slower.
